page.lettertext:
fol.280r
Belgia 1590 Sep
t
Belgia 1590 28 sep
t
To my L. T
rea
s
May yt please yo
r
good L. after
e taking of
e house of
Hemmart, the fort of
Heele
, & two oth
r
places adjoyning. Telshaut
& Crevecoeur were surrendred to
Co. Maurice
, Howbeyt there was
no
thing els don that night d
s
rve
e adv
r
tizing. It is onely
d
etemerined
t
e fort
of Hemart & Crevecoeur shalbe fortifyed &
kept &
e oth
r
two rased as un
fitable. To lease no time, the
Co. w
th
his troupes togeth
r
w
th
S
r
Francis Vere
is marched toward
Derheyde
a fort w
ch
e enemy built to empeach o
r
passage
to
e towne of
Breda
by water, w
ch
moste men think wilbee
easely wonne, They are also afterward
purposed to assay
what may bee don against
Steenberghen
. In
e meane
time
while, yt is in consultac
o
n heer toward
w
ch
te
of
Brabant
& und
r
whose conduct they shall send theyr
forces, for
fourming
t
w
ch
they
mised in theyr laste to
her
Hig
nes
: & I have signifyed in mine of the 22 of
this moneth, wh
r
in they are somewhat yet at a staie, by
reason of a difficulty moved by
e Co. & oth
rs
about him
who think
t
in Brabant
e Boores will forsake
e
plaine Countrey, & runn for succo
r
into walled townes
wh
r
by their Camp yf yt chaunce to range into
e hart of
that Province shalbe destitute of meanes to come by
vittaile & oth
r
necessaries having no good place th
r
about
to make
sedem bellj
, nor to use uppon occasyon for a
safe retrayt.
Floris Tin
e Advocat of
Utrecht
being lately deceasyd, there ys very good hope conceaved
that
Paul Buz
a Utrecht man borne shalbee chosen in his
roome, w
ch
is greatly desyred by her Ma
tyes
friend
in these
part
, aswell for the better direction of the affaires of that
Province as becaus yt is supposed
t
hee will prove a
good counterpoise against
e
Advocate of Holland
in
e assembly of
e
States
, w
ch
is all at this p
nt
that I can
certify yo
r
L. of
so I take &c.
Hagh
. Sep
t
28 1590.
